Customize further
```{r}
medium<-"Facebook"

if (medium == "Linkedin"){
  print("Showing LinkedIn Information")
} else if (medium=="Facebook"){
  print("Showing Facebook Information")
} else {
    print("Unknown medium")
}


```

Else IF 2.0
```{r}
number<-75
result<-""

if (number<10) {
  if (number<5){
    result<-"Extra Small"
  } else {
    result<-"Small"
  }
} else if (number<100) {
  result<-"Medium"
} else {
  result<-"large"
}

print(result)
```
